org.trellisldp.api

Interface NamespaceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NamespacesJsonContext

    public interface NamespaceService
    Namespaces may be stored globally across the server, and the NamespaceService provides a mechanism for retrieving and setting namespace values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<String> getNamespace(String prefix)
      Fetch the namespace for a particular prefix.
      Map<String,String> getNamespaces()
      Fetch the entire namespace mapping.
      Optional<String> getPrefix(String namespace)
      Fetch the prefix for a particular namespace.
      Boolean setPrefix(String prefix, String namespace)
      Set the namespace for a given prefix.

    • Method Detail

      • getNamespaces

        Map<String,String> getNamespaces()
        Fetch the entire namespace mapping.
        Returns:
        the namespace mapping as prefix, namespace pairs

      • getNamespace

        Optional<String> getNamespace(String prefix)
        Fetch the namespace for a particular prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix
        Returns:
        the corresponding namespace

      • getPrefix

        Optional<String> getPrefix(String namespace)
        Fetch the prefix for a particular namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace
        Returns:
        the corresponding prefix

      • setPrefix

        Boolean setPrefix(String prefix,
                  String namespace)
        Set the namespace for a given prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix
        namespace - the namespace
        Returns:
        whether the new prefix was set
